CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1945, pg. 8, reads: "To model in fashion show - What 'milady' will wear for Easter and throughout the spring season will be displayed by these models, Tuesday, March 20, in Schenley High School Auditorium. The fashion show is being sponsored by the Beauty Shop Owners' Association. -  Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of beauty shop owners, including Lillian Allen wearing fur coat and seated on left on sofa, in Centre Avenue YMCA, another version
